messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] FW: [cwhn] National Geographic Adventure Contest
messages.msgSnippet: Ok Cheryl, you have to do this one!  I just saw a family that did this on Oprah and it was awesome.  They went to Africa, but of course, you d go somewhere
messages.messageBody:
Ok Cheryl, you have to do this one! I just saw a family that did this on
Oprah and it was awesome. They went to Africa, but of course, you'd go
somewhere else. It's only two weeks!!! Come on...DO IT!!!

Jenny, wanting to live life vicariously through you on this one! :)

Are you willing to take the challenge?
Each week an American family will travel to a remote
location outside of the United States. Forget the
creature comforts of home and prepare to embrace
another way of life.

http://www.nationalgeographic.com/channel/highlights/worldsapart.html

Is your family outgoing with lots of personality and
ready for an adventure?
If so, you need to meet the following criteria:

1. Have children (ages ranging from 6 to 18) who are
able to travel.
2. Be available to travel for two weeks.
3. Be in good overall health and have health
insurance.

Here's how to apply:
Tell us why we should choose your family.

1. In a home video tape no more than 20 minutes long,
take us on a tour of your lives. Who are you and what
makes your family special?

2. Please print this page, fill out the following
information, and send it along with your VHS or DV
tape to:

Worlds Apart
245 8th Avenue #116
New York, NY 10011

Family name:
Each family member's name, age and gender:
Where is your family from?
Father's occupation?
Mother's occupation?
Does your family have any special interests or
hobbies?
Your contact information:
How did you hear about Worlds Apart?

_________________________________________________________________

http://join.msn.com/?page=features/virus


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
